name: Monopoly Sudoku
description:
MR. MONOPOLY invites you to enjoy a new Sudoku experience! Take on your friends and family members with puzzles for everyone in multiplayer modes. Learn how to improve your grid techniques in the Sudoku School, hone your skills in practice mode, and gain the tools you need to out-think the rest!

Let your inner brainiac shine! Take on your friends, family members or distant opponents in head-to-head matches. Enter seasonal championships to see your name in the hall of fame! Completing Sudoku never felt so good! Level up with daily challenges and multiplayer duels. Every time you level up you’ll move along the MONOPOLY board, unlocking avatars that will show-off your progress. In this MONOPOLY Sudoku game it takes a logical mind to own it all!


Features
- One of the greatest brain teaser puzzles meets one of the greatest board games - Play Sudoku with MONOPOLY flair, for a unique combined experience
- Multiplayer modes - Play solo in practice mode, challenge a friend or family member to a head-to-head match, or challenge players from all over the world
- Ad-free and no in-game transactions - Unlimited access to all features with no further payment or interruptions
- Enter championships - Earn your number 1 spot on the MONOPOLY Sudoku leaderboards!
- Read-up on expert techniques - Learn the best strategies in the Sudoku School
- Solve puzzles to move along the board - Complete multiplayer puzzles to level up and earn your dice rolls, then move along the MONOPOLY board to unlock new avatars and tokens


How to play

PLAY MULTIPLAYER
Do you have a competitive side? Do you want to measure your progress by playing with friends? Turn your successes into wins when you challenge opponents to an online match! Select your puzzle mode and go head-to-head against friends, family members or online opponents.

LEARN THE SKILLS
Want to beat your friends quicker and easier? Becoming the best is easy when you learn the techniques! You can read up on the tips and tricks to solving Sudoku grids in the Sudoku School. Taking notes is just the beginning!

BECOME A CHAMPION
Shine a spotlight on your puzzle skills when you enter Championships. Play your way to the top of the leaderboards. With seasonal championships everyone has a chance to shine!

KNOW MONOPOLY? LEARN SUDOKU!
MR. MONOPOLY will help you find your inner brainiac! There’s a bit more to this game than taking your turn and buying properties! Complete multiplayer grids to increase your hotel level and roll the dice. Your journey is measured on the board. Your destination is waiting at the top of the Sudoku leaderboards!

AN AD-FREE, PREMIUM EXPERIENCE
Are you fed up with being interrupted by adverts? Tackling a tricky puzzle takes concentration, without distracting pop-ups getting in the way! Say goodbye to ads and pay-to-win mechanics. Get MONOPOLY Sudoku to enjoy limitless puzzles and enter all the championships you want! There’s no further cost and no further hassle!

SELECT YOUR TOKEN AND AVATAR
Be recognised by your worthy opponents! Your player piece and avatar will reflect how far you’ve come. The more multiplayer grids you solve, the more dice rolls you’ll earn. And every time you land on a Community Chest, you’ll unlock new avatars and player pieces that will show off your progress!
